com.parrotparty

Class ParrotService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.parrotparty.ParrotService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PropertiesLoader

    @Path(value="/parrots")
public class ParrotService
extends java.lang.Object
implements PropertiesLoader
    A service that processes requests to get information on Party Parrots or to add new Party Parrots to the collection.

      Processes GET requests for all the Party Parrots that belong to a specific category and returns their data as json.

      • getJSONForParrots

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getJSONForParrots()
        Processes GET requests for all the Party Parrots in the collection and returns the data as json.
        Returns:
        a response with json data on all the Party Parrots in the collection

 @Path(value="/{name}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getJSONForParrot(@PathParam(value="name")
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String name)

        Returns:

 @Path(value="/categories")
 @Produces(value="application/json")

        Returns:
        a response with all the categories
